naslov: DVOJNA KUĆA S 3 STANA I POGLEDOM NA MORE NA ČIOVU (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se kuća 220 m2 na odličnoj lokaciji u Okrugu Gornjem na otoku Čiovu, udaljena samo 300 m od mora, 400 m od glavne plaže i 3 km od centra Trogira. Kuća se sastoji od četiri etaže: suteren, prizemlje, 1. kat i 2. kat. Suteren: spremište 4,73m2 Prizemlje: 71,72m2; 2 spavaće sobe, kupaonica, dnevni boravak, kuhinja, hodnik, 2 terase 1. kat: 74,68 m2; 2 spavaće sobe, kupaonica, dnevni boravak, kuhinja, hodnik, 2 terase 2.kat: 71,99 m2; 2 hodnika, predprostor, kuhinja, dnevni boravak, 2 kupaonice, 3 spavaće sobe, terasa Orijentacija kuće je istok, jug i zapad, a povišen položaj omogućava predivan pogled na more s jugozapadne strane. Kući pripada 100 m2 dvorišta i 3 parkirna mjesta na vlastitom dijelu parcele. Vlasništvo čisto! … DUPLEX HOUSE WITH SEA VIEW ON THE ISLAND OF ČIOVO A house of 220 m2 is for sale, in an excellent location in Okrug Gornji on the island of Čiovo, only 300 m from the sea, 400 m from the main beach and 3 km from the center of Trogir. The house consists of four floors: basement, ground floor, 1st floor and 2nd floor. Basement: storage room 4.73m2 Ground floor: 71.72m2; 2 bedrooms, bathroom, living room, kitchen, hallway, 2 terraces 1st floor: 74.68 m2; 2 bedrooms, bathroom, living room, kitchen, hallway, 2 terraces 2nd floor: 71.99 m2; 2 corridors, hall, kitchen, living room, 2 bathrooms, 3 bedrooms, terrace The orientation of the house is east, south and west, and the elevated position allows a wonderful view of the sea from the southwest side. The house has a 100 m2 yard and 3 parking spaces on its own part of the plot. Ownership clean!
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Grijalice i radijatori na struju
adresa_agencije: Adresa:Kneza Branimira 29, 10000 Zagreb, Grad Zagreb, Hrvatska
